titles.title: Lord, by your cross and resurrection

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Lord, by your cross and resurrection
You set us free, You set us free
Lord, by your cross and resurrection
You set us free, You set us free.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You are the Saviour, the Saviour
The Saviour of the World,
You are the Saviour, the Saviour
The Saviour of the World,
Saviour of the world.
